scripts.docker:build: docker build  -t microsigns/k8s-company-service:"$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')" .
scripts.docker:push: docker push microsigns/k8s-company-service:"$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')"
